content: practice your single_crochet stitches with this super easy ear warmer perfect for beginners this winter headband is worked in a flat rectangle and joined to create a twisted front detail thanks to the join you won t have to worry about wiggly newbie edges there are 8 sizes from preemie to adult large but you can easily adjust the length of your chain if you need an additional size the pattern features a photo and video tutorial it s available for free on my blog https //www youshouldcraft com/twisted-ear-warmer-crochet-pattern/ **materials ** 30-100 yards of brava worsted or your favorite worsted weight yarn - i used denim and lady slipper j 6 0 mm crochet hook scissors tapestry needle these headbands are part of a 30-day series for new crocheters learn more here https //www youshouldcraft com/how-to-crochet-30-day-newbie-series/ **share your ear warmers ** if you make an ear warmer or 10 please share them with me on instagram use hashtags #yscnewbie and #youshouldcraft to be featured on the you should craft feed or stories **disclaimer ** you are welcome to sell items made using these patterns using your own images not mine but please provide credit and a link back to youshouldcraft com or my ravelry designer page permission is not granted for mass production or factory manufacturing
